verses.verse: And it came to pass in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> month, the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, that <S%H582>certain<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1875>enquire<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me.
Then came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Are ye <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1875>enquire<s%> of me? As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, I will not be <S%H1875>enquired<s%> of by you.

Wilt thou <S%H8199>judge<s%> them, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, wilt thou <S%H8199>judge<s%> them? cause them to <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>: Wilt: or, Wilt thou plead for them

And <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; In the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H977>chose<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and made myself <S%H3045>known<s%> unto them in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, when I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto them, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>; lifted: or, sware

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto them, to bring them <S%H3318>forth<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> into a <S%H776>land<s%> that I had <S%H8446>espied<s%> for them, <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>, which is the <S%H6643>glory<s%> of all <S%H776>lands<s%>:

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I unto them, Cast ye <S%H7993>away<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H8251>abominations<s%> of his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H2930>defile<s%> not yourselves with the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

But they <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against me, and <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto me: they did not every <S%H376>man<s%> cast <S%H7993>away<s%> the <S%H8251>abominations<s%> of their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, neither did they <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: then I <S%H559>said<s%>, I will pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> upon them, to <S%H3615>accomplish<s%> my <S%H639>anger<s%> against them in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

But I <S%H6213>wrought<s%> for my <S%H8034>name's<s%> sake, that it should not be <S%H2490>polluted<s%> <S%H5869>before<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, <S%H8432>among<s%> whom they were, in whose <S%H5869>sight<s%> I made myself <S%H3045>known<s%> unto them, in bringing them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
Wherefore I caused them to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

And I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and <S%H3045>shewed<s%> them my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, which if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%>, he shall even <S%H2425>live<s%> in them. shewed: Heb. made them to know

Moreover also I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>, to be a <S%H226>sign<s%> between me and them, that they might <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them.

But the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against me in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: they <S%H1980>walked<s%> not in my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and they <S%H3988>despised<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, which if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%>, he shall even <S%H2425>live<s%> in them; and my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> they <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H2490>polluted<s%>: then I <S%H559>said<s%>, I would pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> upon them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, to <S%H3615>consume<s%> them.

But I <S%H6213>wrought<s%> for my <S%H8034>name's<s%> sake, that it should not be <S%H2490>polluted<s%> <S%H5869>before<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, in whose <S%H5869>sight<s%> I brought them <S%H3318>out<s%>.

Yet also I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, that I would not <S%H935>bring<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I had <S%H5414>given<s%> them, <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>, which is the <S%H6643>glory<s%> of all <S%H776>lands<s%>;

Because they <S%H3988>despised<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, and <S%H1980>walked<s%> not in my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, but <S%H2490>polluted<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>: for their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1544>idols<s%>.
Nevertheless mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>spared<s%> them from <S%H7843>destroying<s%> them, neither did I <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H3617>end<s%> of them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

But I <S%H559>said<s%> unto their <S%H1121>children<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, <S%H3212>Walk<s%> ye not in the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, neither <S%H8104>observe<s%> their <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, nor <S%H2930>defile<s%> yourselves with their <S%H1544>idols<s%>:
I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>; <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> them;
And <S%H6942>hallow<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>; and they shall be a <S%H226>sign<s%> between me and you, that ye may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

Notwithstanding the <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against me: they <S%H1980>walked<s%> not in my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, neither <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> them, which if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%>, he shall even <S%H2425>live<s%> in them; they <S%H2490>polluted<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>: then I <S%H559>said<s%>, I would pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> upon them, to <S%H3615>accomplish<s%> my <S%H639>anger<s%> against them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

Nevertheless I <S%H7725>withdrew<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H6213>wrought<s%> for my <S%H8034>name's<s%> sake, that it should not be <S%H2490>polluted<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, in whose <S%H5869>sight<s%> I brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%>.

I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto them also in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, that I would <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them through the <S%H776>countries<s%>;

Because they had not <S%H6213>executed<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, but had <S%H3988>despised<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and had <S%H2490>polluted<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>, and their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1>fathers'<s%> <S%H1544>idols<s%>.
Wherefore I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them also <S%H2706>statutes<s%> that were not <S%H2896>good<s%>, and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> whereby they should not <S%H2421>live<s%>;

And I <S%H2930>polluted<s%> them in their own <S%H4979>gifts<s%>, in that they caused to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the fire all that <S%H6363>openeth<s%> the <S%H7356>womb<s%>, that I might make them <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, to the end that they might <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Therefore, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Yet in this your <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H1442>blasphemed<s%> me, in that they have <S%H4603>committed<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against me. committed: Heb. trespassed a trespass

For when I had <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%>, for the which I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> it to them, then they <S%H7200>saw<s%> every <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill<s%>, and all the <S%H5687>thick<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%>, and they <S%H2076>offered<s%> there their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>, and there they <S%H5414>presented<s%> the <S%H3708>provocation<s%> of their <S%H7133>offering<s%>: there also they <S%H7760>made<s%> their <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savour<s%>, and poured <S%H5258>out<s%> there their drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%>.

Then I <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, What is the high <S%H1116>place<s%> whereunto ye <S%H935>go<s%>? And the <S%H8034>name<s%> thereof is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1117>Bamah<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>. I said: or, I told them what the high place was, or, Bamah

Wherefore <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Are ye <S%H2930>polluted<s%> after the <S%H1870>manner<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%>? and commit ye <S%H2181>whoredom<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H8251>abominations<s%>?

For when ye <S%H5375>offer<s%> your <S%H4979>gifts<s%>, when ye make your <S%H1121>sons<s%> to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>, ye <S%H2930>pollute<s%> yourselves with all your <S%H1544>idols<s%>, even unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>: and shall I be <S%H1875>enquired<s%> of by you, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, I will not be <S%H1875>enquired<s%> of by you.

And that which <S%H5927>cometh<s%> into your <S%H7307>mind<s%> shall not be at all, that ye <S%H559>say<s%>, We will <S%H1961>be<s%> as the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, as the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H776>countries<s%>, to <S%H8334>serve<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone<s%>.

As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, surely with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and with a stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>, and with <S%H2534>fury<s%> poured <S%H8210>out<s%>, will I <S%H4427>rule<s%> over you:

And I will bring you <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and will <S%H6908>gather<s%> you out of the <S%H776>countries<s%> wherein ye are <S%H6327>scattered<s%>, with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and with a stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>, and with <S%H2534>fury<s%> poured <S%H8210>out<s%>.
And I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and there will I <S%H8199>plead<s%> with you <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face<s%>.

Like as I <S%H8199>pleaded<s%> with your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, so will I <S%H8199>plead<s%> with you, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.
And I will cause you to <S%H5674>pass<s%> under the <S%H7626>rod<s%>, and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H4562>bond<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>: bond: or, delivering

And I will purge <S%H1305>out<s%> from among you the <S%H4775>rebels<s%>, and them that <S%H6586>transgress<s%> against me: I will bring them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>country<s%> where they <S%H4033>sojourn<s%>, and they shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

As for you, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; <S%H3212>Go<s%> ye, <S%H5647>serve<s%> ye every <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H1544>idols<s%>, and <S%H310>hereafter<s%> also, if ye will not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto me: but <S%H2490>pollute<s%> ye my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> no more with your <S%H4979>gifts<s%>, and with your <S%H1544>idols<s%>.

For in mine <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H4791>height<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, there shall all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, all of them in the <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H5647>serve<s%> me: there will I <S%H7521>accept<s%> them, and there will I <S%H1875>require<s%> your <S%H8641>offerings<s%>, and the <S%H7225>firstfruits<s%> of your <S%H4864>oblations<s%>, with all your holy <S%H6944>things<s%>. firstfruits: or, chief

I will <S%H7521>accept<s%> you with your <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savour<s%>, when I bring you <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H6908>gather<s%> you out of the <S%H776>countries<s%> wherein ye have been <S%H6327>scattered<s%>; and I will be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in you <S%H5869>before<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>. sweet: Heb. savour of rest

And ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, when I shall <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, into the <S%H776>country<s%> for the which I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> it to your <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And there shall ye <S%H2142>remember<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and all your <S%H5949>doings<s%>, wherein ye have been <S%H2930>defiled<s%>; and ye shall <S%H6962>lothe<s%> yourselves in your own <S%H6440>sight<s%> for all your <S%H7451>evils<s%> that ye have <S%H6213>committed<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, when I have <S%H6213>wrought<s%> with you for my <S%H8034>name's<s%> sake, not according to your <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%>, nor according to your <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> <S%H5949>doings<s%>, O ye <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H8486>south<s%>, and <S%H5197>drop<s%> thy word toward the <S%H1864>south<s%>, and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against the <S%H3293>forest<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%>;

And <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H3293>forest<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Behold, I will <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in thee, and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> every <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> in thee, and every <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>: the <S%H3852>flaming<s%> <S%H7957>flame<s%> shall not be <S%H3518>quenched<s%>, and all <S%H6440>faces<s%> from the <S%H5045>south<s%> to the <S%H6828>north<s%> shall be <S%H6866>burned<s%> therein.
And all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1197>kindled<s%> it: it shall not be <S%H3518>quenched<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H162>Ah<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>! they <S%H559>say<s%> of me, Doth he not <S%H4911>speak<s%> <S%H4912>parables<s%>?
